CustomField.description: This property will determine the increment value when regenerating a document using the same template (Regenerating with a different template will always reset the counter). Acceptable values for this field are "Major" or "Minor". Default value is Major
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This property will determine the increment value when regenerating a document using the same template (Regenerating with a different template will always reset the counter). Acceptable values for this field are "Major" or "Minor". Default value is Major
CustomField.label: Document Regenerate
